message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I believe it's highly valuable and worth the price.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $120 for the product. Thank you for considering my offer.

Hi Bob, I understand your position. While I believe $150 is a fair reflection of its value, I'm willing to come down to $140. This is a very competitive offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $130 for the product.
